TopicTitle: need help with the old Gearbay

Articles.Content:
So I have a file for the old Landing gear model but I need help with It cause It won't roll or Retract.

I'm also planning to also give it a new stock alike texture

At one point Squad made big change to wheels (I don't remember when but 1.3.X rings a bell) requiring a redo of the model. Depending on how old your model is it may require a rebuild - having not built any wheels before the change I can't tell you what the differences are.
